channel.title: Uploading files to SDcard > 8Mb fails
channel.description: Hi there I tried uploading files on a SDcard and it works but it says that they are 0 Kb and they don't play. I use the file manager. Then in the patch I use has wave/play fn stereo and I load the path usually /file.raw. Where am I wrong? I saw that it works for small size files 8Mb. But I'd like something like 20Mb or more. Fresh Axoloti fresh software all on fresh Mac Thanks A

item.title: Uploading files to SDcard > 8Mb fails
item.dc:creator: @jestern Alberto
item.description:
@jestern wrote:

Solved by loading from computer directly

Read full topic

Hi there I tried uploading files on a SDcard and it works but it says that they are 0 Kb and they don't play. I use the file manager. Then in the patch I use has wave/play fn stereo and I load the path usually /file.raw. Where am I wrong?
I saw that it works for small size files 8Mb. But I'd like something like 20Mb or more.
